title: Fundamentals Workshop on Acoustic Metamaterial Sound Absorber Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: A foundational competency-building program for pre-service teachers to integrate acoustic metamaterial design concepts into language education.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the fundamental principles and structure of acoustic metamaterial absorbers
Learners understand the low-frequency absorption mechanism of micro-perforated panels combined with Fibonacci cavity structures
Learners can explain the basic concepts of deep learning-based structural optimization methods and apply them to the design process
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
